body_text: I think it's better practice to provide moment with the date format instead of having it guess. I'm not sure how last_updated is formatted though so maybe this is a non-issue.
body: I think it's better practice to provide `moment` with the date format instead of having it guess. I'm not sure how `last_updated` is formatted though so maybe this is a non-issue.
